post.body: you made out my friend! All great movies, btw!!!
WOOHOO!!!!!! I am so happy for you! What about John Paul??
this is the only way we get through Christmas eve~
we just did the same! It's like 70 degrees here!
give him a happy birthday noogie from me, not that it will do any damage! ;)
can't wait to hear our plans. Amy sent me a gift card to SB!! I know that has to be on the list. We'll drink in her honor!
amazon is where I get most everything for my kids or toysrus.com
@LeeAnneEwaldsen that is CRAZY!!
this Saturday? For sure!!
I am making stuffed french toast... sans pecans!
Had a yummy Christmas dinner and wore my tight jeans (they're all tight I know) so I wouldn't overeat! Didn't work. Can't. Breath.
is wondering if santa brought LeeAnne what she wanted....
where are all the batteries???
wonders how we ever got so many Christmas traditions...
just made the traditional baked potato soup and doesn't want any...
ok maybe not starving, but hungry!
just had a fab nap and am starving now!
somehow left a gift off of amazon order. pooh!
loves that her bff amy understands her addiction to starbucks. Thanks Ames!!
had the BEST dinner at Ruths Chris. Thanks Mickey and Maggie!!Can't wait to do it again, this time, our treat! Toby is thinking Krystal! ;)
